Reviews.Title: “Don't believe the web site”
Reviews.Author: Andy_jm55
Reviews.Content: The web site says "Free Wi-Fi". OK yes it is free .......WHEN it works!!!! afer numerous complaints all I ended up with was shrugged shoulders!!! It may also be worth taking your own towels as all they supply are and towels!!! Very noisey ... traffic all night ... people moving in the room upstairs ... people climbing the stairs late at night ... banging doors ... even the alarm clock from the room next door!!!

Reviews.Title: “very good value”
Reviews.Author: kawaki1
Reviews.Content: great hotel for budget travellers. single room was pretty small but perfectly adequate if you only want to sleep there. room was clean as was shared bathroom & shower. staff could have been around more but friendly when they were. local area extremely quiet but has bakeries,cafes & small shop on same street with a large supermarket only 5 mins walk away. location is a bit east of city centre but s-bahn station is nearby with frequent trains which have you at centre in around 15 mins. overall if like me you only want to sleep in your hotel & be 15 mins away from all major attractions for a really low price then i would recommend hotel adamshof.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel-Pension Adamshof
HotelInfo.Address: Emanuelstrasse 3, 10317 Berlin, Germany
